items.title: Agri Picks Report April 29, 2025: Geojit Financial Services
items.description: According to Geojit Financial Services, Sowing of rabi crops in Telangana was at 7.94 million acres (1 acre = 0.4 hectares) as of Wednesday, up 17.2% from 6.77 million acres a year ago, according to a report released by the state agriculture department.

items.title: Emotional Capital in Trading: The forgotten aspect
items.description: Winning traders have the mindset of a champion, which comes from extremely disciplined practice over long periods

items.title: UltraTech Cement stock in focus on in-line Q4 show, brokerages hike target price
items.description: Nuvama increased its target price on UltraTech Cement, factoring in a better pricing environment but believes the upside is capped on high valuations.

items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: Nifty opens above 24,350, Sensex up 180 pts; Tata Technologies, Hexaware, Adani Green in focus

items.title: Wall Street in red as tech heavyweights retreat ahead of earnings; Trade talks in focus
items.description: On the trade front, Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said Monday that it was up to China to "de-escalate" trade tensions, arguing that the U.S. had the upper hand given the trade imbalance.

items.title: Bulk & Block deals: Graviton Research buys 1% stake in RBL Bank on April 28
items.description: In Samhi Hotels, GTI Capital Alpha Pvt Ltd offloaded a significant chunk of shares, selling 20,81,578 shares or 0.94 percent at an average price of Rs 175.55 per share.

items.title: S&P500, Nasdaq Composite slip ahead of tech earnings; Dow Jones adds 150 pts
items.description: Trade negotiations remained a key source of uncertainty. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent offered few new details about the ongoing talks with China, instead placing the burden of progress on Beijing.

items.title: FIIs turn net buyers for April after 9-day buying streak, invest Rs 2,474 crore
items.description: For the year so far, FIIs have been net sellers of shares worth Rs 1.39 lakh crore, while DIIs have net bought Rs 2.03 lakh crore worth of shares.

items.title: Q4FY25 earnings impact: UCO Bank shares rise 4%, AWL Agri and Castrol India shares fall
items.description: Earnings Reaction | Castrol India and AWL Agri Business shares dropped while shares of UCO Bank were higher after the quarterly results.

items.title: Mahindra & Mahindra| Key player in SUV car segment and Farm equipment
items.description: Mahindra & Mahindra is a versatile company. Company has made its debut in the highly competitive EV 4 wheeler market. It is set to acquire 58.96% stake in SML Isuzu, and establish a stronger presence in the over 3.5-tonne (T) commercial vehicle segment.

items.title: Which life insurance company’s stock should investors bet on?
items.description: HDFC Life has the most balanced product mix, ICICI Pru has the most diversified distribution mix, and SBI Life has the lowest cost structure

items.title: TVS continues to maintain growth momentum
items.description: Robust demand from rural and international markets supports quarterly performance
